Description:
Responsible for influencing, coordinating, and managing all Civil/Structural Engineering related activities.
Participate in technical reviews and studies and ensure that technical reviews and studies receive the appropriate Civil/Structural related engineering input. Exercises judgment in making decisions; knows when to seek advice.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor of Science degree in Engineering or equivalent.
Minimum of 10 years of relevant experience Construction industry with comprehensive experience in Civil/Structural Engineering, associated technologies and facilities.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Excellent technical, team-working and interpersonal skills.
Experience and detailed knowledge of relevant international codes and standards. Candidates with previous experience on projects will be given priority.
Ability to make independent decisions in the planning, organizing, and coordination of solutions to complex problems.
Experience as a Lead Engineer for a team of discipline engineers.
We offer an excellent package which includes:

A competitive salary
Transportation allowance
Medical and life insurance cover
26 calendar days annual leave
Medical and life insurance cover
Company gratuity scheme
Discretionary bonus scheme
Annual flight allowance to point of origin
